DOC.detailed_description: The primary endpoint assessment ability TetraGraph prototype deliver neuro-stimulation , assessment ability acquire muscle action potential record evoke responses SD-card . The study perform healthy volunteer - 10 male 10 female . Testing do two separate stimulation/recording site : ulnar nerve stimulation/abductor digiti minimi ( ADM ) muscle record ; ulnar nerve stimulation/adductor pollex ( AP ) muscle record . The side testing ( RIGHT vs. LEFT hand ) determine priori randomly principal investigator , 10 volunteer test RIGHT 10 LEFT hand . At stimulating/recording site two stimulation protocol ( single twitch stimulation train-of-four stimulation ) perform grow current intensity ( 10-60 mA ( milliAmps ) , 10 mA step-up fashion ) . Volunteers rate tolerability stimulation protocols visual analogue scale . EMG data record SD card evaluate off-line .
